@usedefault

h4. dbtype

possible db types are: fs,mem,arakoon,redis  (redis for now not implemented)
@dbtype:mem 

the first type used will also be linked to actor.db & will be used to store the models linked to the actor

h4. dbserializer
possible list of serializers, is comma separated  if multiple
@dbserializer:ujson,blosc  #will first serialize using ujson then blosc

serializers can be found on q.db.serializers e.g.:
{{code:
q.db.serializers.blosc   q.db.serializers.msgpack q.db.serializers.snappy  q.db.serializers.ujson
q.db.serializers.int     q.db.serializers.pickle  q.db.serializers.time
}}
